name: Fire
lyric:
fire, it wont burn

my heart is studded with dirt

fire, it wont burn

i am so weeny, too wispy to be heard

fire, when will it burn

my heart is exploding with dirt

fire, it wont burn

i am so dim, never to be heard

when will the bolide come and carry me away

i am bored & tired, wanna be fired

will it really come here and pick me up

that liar, when will he die

no one cares his naive jokes

that liar, he wont die

he's in a mummery, play with his own

fire, when will it burn

my heart is exploding with dirt

fire, it wont burn

i am so dim, never to be heard

when will the bolide come and carry me away

i am bored & tired, wanna be fired

will it really come here and pick me up

when will the bolide come and carry me away

i am bored & tired, wanna be fired

will it really come here and pick me up
